title: YouTuber Famous For Drag Racing Videos Dies In High-Speed BMW Car Crash
content: A 25-year-old influencer and YouTuber, famous for his drag-racing videos, died in a car crash early Wednesday morning on the Nassau Expressway in Queens, New York.
summary: A 25-year-old influencer and YouTuber, famous for his drag-racing videos, died in a car crash early Wednesday morning on the Nassau Expressway in Queens, New York.

title: "Your Unifying Message Of Hope...": Rahul Gandhi Writes To Kamala Harris
content: Rahul Gandhi's message to Kamala Harris came after she lost to Donald Trump in the hotly-contested US presidential polls.
summary: Rahul Gandhi's message to Kamala Harris came after she lost to Donald Trump in the hotly-contested US presidential polls.

title: Zelenskiy, Putin Vie For Edge With Trump Ahead Of Ukraine Pivot
content: The leaders of Ukraine and Russia began jockeying for influence with President-elect Donald Trump in the immediate aftermath of the US election, seeking to gain an advantage in his promised push for a resolution to their years-long conflict.
summary: The leaders of Ukraine and Russia began jockeying for influence with President-elect Donald Trump in the immediate aftermath of the US election, seeking to gain an advantage in his promised push for a resolution to their years-long conflict.

title: Joe Biden Believes His Decision To Drop Out Of Presidential Race Was "Correct": White House
content: Blaming the US President's incumbent status for Vice President Kamala Harris' electoral defeat, the White House has said that Joe Biden felt it was the "correct" decision he made to not run for the presidential race.
summary: Blaming the US President's incumbent status for Vice President Kamala Harris' electoral defeat, the White House has said that Joe Biden felt it was the "correct" decision he made to not run for the presidential race.

title: First Artwork By Humanoid Robot Sells For $1.3 Million
content: A portrait of English mathematician Alan Turing became the first artwork by a humanoid robot to be sold at auction, fetching $1,320,000 on Thursday.
summary: A portrait of English mathematician Alan Turing became the first artwork by a humanoid robot to be sold at auction, fetching $1,320,000 on Thursday.

title: Fired Worker Shoots Ex-Boss In New York City. Flees Through Subway Tunnels
content: A recently dismissed employee of a computer repair store shot his former boss in New York City's Upper West Side area on Wednesday and fled into the subway system to evade the police.
summary: A recently dismissed employee of a computer repair store shot his former boss in New York City's Upper West Side area on Wednesday and fled into the subway system to evade the police.

title: Elon Musk Replies To 'We Need Your Help Removing Trudeau' Post
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has predicted the downfall of Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in the upcoming Canadian federal election.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has predicted the downfall of Canada's Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in the upcoming Canadian federal election.

title: Why More Young Men Voted For Donald Trump
content: Among younger voters aged 18-29, 49 percent of men voted for Donald Trump -- shattering previous images of young people generally leaning left.
summary: Among younger voters aged 18-29, 49 percent of men voted for Donald Trump -- shattering previous images of young people generally leaning left.

title: Meet Anita Verma-Lallian, Indian-Origin Woman Who Bought Matthew Perry's Home
content: An Indian-origin real estate developer and film producer has purchased 'Friends' star Matthew Perry's Los Angeles home.
summary: An Indian-origin real estate developer and film producer has purchased 'Friends' star Matthew Perry's Los Angeles home.

title: Judge Strikes Down Joe Biden's Immigration Policy For Undocumented Spouses
content: The "Keeping Families Together" policy, allowed certain undocumented immigrants married to US nationals to apply for permanent residency without leaving the country, as was previously required.
summary: The "Keeping Families Together" policy, allowed certain undocumented immigrants married to US nationals to apply for permanent residency without leaving the country, as was previously required.

title: Biden Administration "Proud Of" Strengthening Ties With India: Official
content: The Biden Administration is incredibly proud of strengthening ties with India, a senior administration official said on Thursday.
summary: The Biden Administration is incredibly proud of strengthening ties with India, a senior administration official said on Thursday.

title: Foreign Minister S Jaishankar Discusses Ties With Singapore's Deputy PM
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Friday met Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong and discussed with him ways to take forward contemporary bilateral partnership.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Friday met Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong and discussed with him ways to take forward contemporary bilateral partnership.

title: Opinion: Why Did Kamala Harris Lose? Because Democrats Guilt-Tripped Americans
content: Kamala Harriss campaign raised and spent more money than Donald Trump, but what was the substance? The political messaging barely managed to escape the rhetoric of Save America from Trump.
summary: Kamala Harriss campaign raised and spent more money than Donald Trump, but what was the substance? The political messaging barely managed to escape the rhetoric of Save America from Trump.

title: US Fed Cuts Interest Rates A Quarter Point After Trump Victory
content: The US Federal Reserve shrugged off concerns about the impact of Donald Trump's election victory on interest rates and moved ahead with a quarter point cut Thursday.
summary: The US Federal Reserve shrugged off concerns about the impact of Donald Trump's election victory on interest rates and moved ahead with a quarter point cut Thursday.

title: "First-Ever In US History": Trump Picks A Woman White House Chief Of Staff
content: Susie Wiles, who is credited for Donald Trump's successful presidential bid, is the daughter of Pat Summerall, a prominent football player and sportscaster.
summary: Susie Wiles, who is credited for Donald Trump's successful presidential bid, is the daughter of Pat Summerall, a prominent football player and sportscaster.

title: "I Don't See Future In US": Musk's Transgender Daughter After Trump's Win
content: Following Donald Trump's US election win, Elon Musk's estranged trans daughter, Vivian Wilson, announced her intention to leave the US, saying she doesn't see a future in the country.
summary: Following Donald Trump's US election win, Elon Musk's estranged trans daughter, Vivian Wilson, announced her intention to leave the US, saying she doesn't see a future in the country.

title: US Capitol Rioters, Supporters Of Donald Trump, Await Pardons
content: Donald Trump supporters who were charged with storming the US Capitol are now expecting pardons from the incoming American president, who has lauded them as "patriots" and "political prisoners."

title: F-15 Fighter Jets Arrive In Middle East: US Military
content: American F-15 fighter planes arrived in the Middle East on Thursday, the US military said, after Washington announced the deployment of additional assets to the region in a warning to Iran.

title: Throughout History, Jews Found Refuge In India: Israeli Envoy Reuven Azar
content: India never harboured a sense of anti-semitism, which encouraged Jews to come here for refuge, said Israeli ambassador to India, Reuven Azar.
summary: India never harboured a sense of anti-semitism, which encouraged Jews to come here for refuge, said Israeli ambassador to India, Reuven Azar.

title: Centenarians Increased By 30% In Italy While Birth Rate Continues To Decline
content: The number of people aged over 100 in Italy has increased by 30% over the past 10 years, while birth rates have continued to decline.
summary: The number of people aged over 100 in Italy has increased by 30% over the past 10 years, while birth rates have continued to decline.
